title: october 26: the patriot who?
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia explains the 300-page Patriot Act bill, its causes, and its sprawling effects. In a lighter moment, Maia talks about an epic prank war between rappers. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
